snippet: The family of an Iranian-American former U.S. Marine held in Iran since 2011 called on Saturday for senior Iranian officials to review his conviction and 10-year prison sentence on charges of collaborating with the U.S. government and to free him....

headline.print_headline: Former U.S. Marine's Family Asks Iran to Reconsider Prison Term
headline.main: Former U.S. Marine's Family Asks Iran to Reconsider Prison Term

lead_paragraph: The family of an Iranian-American former U.S. Marine held in Iran since 2011 called on Saturday for senior Iranian officials to review his conviction and 10-year prison sentence on charges of collaborating with the U.S. government and to free him.
